biotools.summary: It is a database focused on interactions established by extracellular proteins and polysaccharides. It takes into account the multimeric nature of several extracellular protein families for the curation of interactions, and reports interactions with individual polypeptide chains or with multimers, considered as permanent complexes.

bioschemas.name: MatrixDB
